name: Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger

files.wc3installer: N/A:Select location of GOG executable (should be setup_wing_commander3_2.1.x.x.exe)

content:
files:
- wc3installer: N/A:Select location of GOG executable (should be setup_wing_commander3_2.1.x.x.exe)
- innoextract: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- p7z: https://lutris.net/files/tools/p7zip-16.02-x86_64.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: dosboxWC3.conf
  main_file: WC3.EXE
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/p7z
    file: p7z
- execute:
    args: --extract $wc3installer --output-dir $CACHE/tmp --gog
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- execute:
    args: x -y -o$CACHE/wc3/disk $CACHE/tmp/app/DATA.DAT
    file: $CACHE/p7z/7z
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/wc3/disk
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/WC3
    src: $CACHE/tmp/app/WC3
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/tmp/app/dosboxWC3.conf
- input_menu:
    description: Choose your desktop resolution
    id: RES
    options:
    - 3840x2160: 3840x2160
    - 2560x1440: 2560x1440
    - 1600x1200: 1600x1200
    - 1920x1200: 1920x1200
    - 1920x1080: 1920x1080
    - 1280x1024: 1280x1024
    - 1600x900: 1600x900
    - 1440x900: 1440x900
    - 1280x800: 1280x800
    - 1366x768: 1366x768
    - 1360x768: 1360x768
    - 1024x768: 1024x768
    - 1280x720: 1280x720
    preselect: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxWC3.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: openglnb
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxWC3.conf
    key: scaler
    section: render
    value: none
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxWC3.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxWC3.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: $INPUT_RES
